zoran_101 wrote:

> My question is how can I achieve the run of all the 100 test even if
> some of them fail.

There is something called the Parameterized Test Case pattern with 
JUnit. The basic idea is to get fixture data into your TestCase subclass 
through the constructor, then use the suite() method to create a custom 
test suite with a test for each row of fixture data. For details, look 
around the web, or in the book _JUnit Recipes_, recipe 4.8.
